message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000.  I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Can we meet in the middle at $9,500?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is closer to the value, I'm aiming for a slightly higher price. How about $11,000?
I understand that you're looking for a higher price, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to meet you at $9,500, but I can go up to $10,000. Can we meet in the middle at $9,750?
